productDescription:
Crafted from 100% Egyptian cotton (120 thread count)

Material Composition:
- 100% Egyptian cotton
- Mother of pearl buttons
- Reinforced collar stays

Fit Details:
- Regular fit through chest and waist
- Shoulder-to-shoulder measurements: S(17"), M(18"), L(19")
- Center back length: 30 inches

Care Instructions:
- Machine wash cold
- Tumble dry low
- Iron on medium heat
- Do not bleach

Design Features:
- Button-down collar
- Single chest pocket
- Split yoke
- Rounded hem

Styling Tips:
- Perfect for formal occasions when paired with tailored trousers
- Can be dressed down with chinos for a smart-casual look
- Layer under a blazer for business meetings

Modern high-rise jeans with perfect stretch

Material Composition:
- 92% Cotton, 6% Polyester, 2% Elastane
- Premium stretch denim
- Brushed metal hardware

Fit Details:
- High-rise fit: 11-inch rise
- Slim through hip and thigh
- Ankle length
- Inseam: 28 inches

Care Instructions:
- Machine wash cold with similar colors
- Inside out wash recommended
- Tumble dry medium
- Do not bleach

Design Features:
- Sculpting stretch technology
- Five-pocket styling
- Contoured waistband
- Reinforced belt loops

Styling Tips:
- Perfect with cropped tops for a modern look
- Pair with ankle boots and blazer for office wear
- Great with oversized sweaters for weekend style

Lightweight yet warm winter puffer jacket

Material Composition:
- Outer: 100% Recycled polyester
- Fill: Premium synthetic down
- Water-resistant coating
- YKK zippers

Fit Details:
- Regular fit with room for layering
- Hip length
- Sleeve length: 25 inches
- Center back length: 26 inches

Care Instructions:
- Machine wash cold
- Tumble dry low
- No ironing required
- Use wool dryer balls

Design Features:
- Diamond quilting pattern
- Stand-up collar with chin guard
- Two zippered hand pockets
- Internal chest pocket

Styling Tips:
- Layer over sweaters for extra warmth
- Pairs well with both casual and athletic wear
- Perfect for outdoor activities

Luxurious merino wool turtleneck sweater

Material Composition:

- Ribbed texture

Fit Details:
- Slim fit silhouette
- Full length sleeves
- Ribbed turtleneck

Care Instructions:

- Do not wring
- Dry clean recommended

- Ribbed cuffs and hem
- Seamless construction
- Double-layer turtleneck
- Reinforced shoulders

Styling Tips:
- Perfect under blazers for office wear
- Pair with high-waisted pants
- Layer under coats for winter

Elegant pleated midi skirt with flowing movement
